featured.text: Which of the following is closest in meaning to “ ” in the second paragraph? (A) advertises (B) dedicates (C) replaces (D) participates 51.
These meat substitutes are often advertised as beneficial for the environment.

definition.en_def: To promote a product, service, or event through various media to attract public attention.
definition.example: The company decided to advertise their new smartphone on social media.
